@fourmajor Can you email epicwin@supermono-studios.com with more detail (the bug, your phone model, iOS version) & we'll investigate Thanks!
@jlfwong Loot is tied to yr current level, but got a little scrambled in the last update, but  new update speeds up levelling = moar loot :)
@boogah Haha - good luck with that epic quest!
@imkyleoneill Haha, the explosions are even more epic in the new update! (hopefully live on the appstore soon :)
@garthk Thanks! We're trying to get a good balance between simple & fast, and then some optional deeper features for those that want them
@ckueda That's fixed up in v1.2 (its waiting for Apple approval) anything you achieve in the new version moves to separate history page
@Mullenkedheim Yes, we've fixed a multitasking crash in the newly submitted update, hopefully its the same bug as yours ;)
@JoeTheDough Yes, syncing with a variety of sources is in the future update pipeline..
If you missed it at the wkend: EpicWin V1.2 has been submitted to Apple! Retina gfx, quicker levelling, history tab etc http://bit.ly/c1vOYk
@Extraxis Not sure where you think they've been removed from - we're still chatting about Android on our Facebook page
@tullyhansen but "incarcaration" is so much more epic ;) We've put a "Dictionary Of Long Words Like Incarceration" loot item in new update!

Update 1.2 has been submitted to Apple HQ! 

- Retina Graphics 
- A much better Levelling Up curve
- Repeated... http://fb.me/FAkBApuw
@dodgydev Your wish has been granted in V1.2 :) http://bit.ly/aJFZdm
@reese015 Yes, they move to the "Beaten" section in V1.2 like so: http://bit.ly/8YjlZY
@dcsleeps :) Yes- there may be a slight delay with all the updates being submitted for iOS4.1 atm but fingers-crossed it'll be out v soon!
@stefangrambart Yep, that's one of the main additions in the update after the one we've just finished :)
@Mut1ey yes we had a plan to do that - altho a hard balance as its more about rewarding than punishing, but more gamey elements planned
@Mut1ey If you don't do the washing-up it deletes all the contacts of your phone :)
@MariusCiocanel @semanticist update v1.2 speeds up the levelling for adventurers living in the fast lane :)
@grovberg Yes, that's the one. They move to a separate history page when completed in v1.2  Screenshots here: http://bit.ly/9iGYEj
@DDNVekter We're trying to get that started - it is a lot of work and riskier to develop for, but we're trying to get over the hurdles!
.@gamesdaypodcast has put up a nice video review of EpicWin v1.1 http://bit.ly/cPaSaz & we've fixed their only big issue with it in v1.2 :)
@rfletcherEW could you describe the bug in as much detail as possible to epicwin@supermono-studios.com so we can earn some XP by fixing it!
@rfletcherEW The only crash we've found so far is a multitasking issue on iOS4, which is now fixed in the new update we're submitting now
@rfletcherEW We're not aware of any crash issues in the current version - did you update it?
@tedjamesbutler there are some very epic sounds in the next update coming (and maybe most importantly: an option to turn them off ;)
@waste_not unfortunately that was a one-off to fix the evil crash bug, now that's vanquished we can just put nice new things into EpicWin!
I posted 3 photos on Facebook in the album "EpicWin - 2nd update" http://fb.me/vWm5GRwz
@jedenbod As far as I know, that just happens on Jailbroken iPhones, we can't provide support but this might help you: http://bit.ly/cTmBTK
@lanaglama We're speeding up the levelling in the next update :) Plus all those duplicate lootz will come in useful in the future...
@boogah there is definitely a way someone could fix that, it's 1 of the many improvements in the next update we are about to submit to Apple
@LG_silentgenius could you please email epicwin@supermono-studios.com with some more details so we can look into it, thankyou!
App-Of-The-Week on the AppStore homepage in UK, France, Germany & Russia (Come on USA, don't get left out ;) http://fb.me/Is9k4lGa
@TheZeis That was great! You've got the EPICWIIIIIIN voice perfect :)
